page.title: 09Homes
page.content: {Homes}have changed a lot since the beginning of the nineteenth century. The insides have changed the most.The cookers have changed. Now we have microwaves,fatfryers,sinks and watertaps. In the nineteen twenties people washed thier clothes in a wash bowl,in 1985 we use{washing machines}to wash most of our clothes and tumble driers are common in many homes. We have{electricity}now in Findern,in the 1920's the only light was a lantern.We also have a television and a stereo and a 48k Spectrum and a Colour Genie computer which you wouldn't have in the past. I have a desk where I do my homework and bunkbeds in mine and my sisters bedrooms. We have a flush toilet and a seperate{bathroom}with a bath, sink and shower.
